name: frontend-patient-html
description: Einfache HTML-Seite f√ºr Anwender ohne Zugriff auf native App.

scripts.start: npm i && cp node_modules/qr-scanner/*.min.js docs/ && cp node_modules/bulma/css/bulma.min.css docs/ && cp node_modules/normalize.css/normalize.css docs/ && browser-sync start --cors --h localhost --https -s docs -f docs
scripts.start-win: powershell -Command "npm i ; cp node_modules/qr-scanner/*.min.js docs/; cp node_modules/bulma/css/bulma.min.css docs/; cp node_modules/normalize.css/normalize.css docs/ ; browser-sync start --cors --h localhost --https -s docs -f docs"

author: Florian Breisch <florian.breisch@mindkeeper.solutions>
